articles.author: Avaneesh Mishra
articles.title: Rishabh Pant accident: Cricketer hospitalised after accident near Roorkee, reportedly out of danger
articles.description: Rishabh Pant was on his way to his hometown Roorkee from Delhi when he reportedly lost control of his car and hit the divider. The car immediately caught fire and was charred within minutes, police sources said.
articles.content: Wicketkeeper-batsman Rishabh Pant met with an accident near Uttarakhands Roorkee early on Saturday morning and suffered injuries after his car crashed into road dividers and later caught fire. Pant, … [+3637 chars]

articles.title: Azeem Rafiq: Hate crime inquiry after man defecates in cricketer's garden
articles.description: Ex-Yorkshire bowler Azeem Rafiq says he has been abused since highlighting racism at his old club.
articles.content:
A hate crime investigation has been started by police after a man defecated in the garden of former Yorkshire cricketer Azeem Rafiq.
Earlier this month, the ex-bowler told MPs he had become a target… [+1501 chars]

articles.title: PCB hands Umar Akmal three-year ban from all cricket | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Penalty after the batsman pleaded guilty to not reporting corrupt approaches | ESPNcricinfo.com

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
